title: Material Passport Template
description: Track provenance, condition, and certifications for reused materials. Essential for audit trails and property owner compliance.
usage: Complete one passport per item or batch of identical items. Attach copies of certificates and test reports.

title: BVB Equivalency Declaration
description: Document that reused materials meet BVB (ByggVarubedömningen) equivalent standards for property owner approval.
usage: Submit to property owner sustainability team before design finalization. Attach all referenced test reports and certificates.

title: Fire Testing Checklist
description: Pre-testing checklist to ensure items are properly prepared and documented for fire safety testing at RISE or SP laboratories.

title: Supplier RFQ Template
description: Request for Quotation template specifically designed for circular furniture procurement from B2B reuse operators.
usage: Send to multiple qualified operators. Allow 1-2 weeks for response. Include photos of desired aesthetic if available.

title: Quality Inspection Form
description: Standardized inspection form for evaluating reused furniture quality upon delivery or during warehouse assessment.

gradeDefinitions.A: Excellent - Near-new condition, no visible wear
gradeDefinitions.B: Good - Minor wear consistent with use, fully functional
gradeDefinitions.C: Acceptable - Visible wear, may need minor repair, functional

title: Circular Procurement Clauses
description: Standard contract clauses for incorporating circular economy requirements into procurement agreements.

clauses.title: Circular Content Minimum
clauses.text: The Supplier shall ensure that a minimum of [X]% of supplied furniture items by value are sourced from reused, refurbished, or remanufactured sources with documented provenance.

clauses.title: Material Passport Requirement
clauses.text: The Supplier shall provide a Material Passport for each item or batch of items delivered, documenting origin, condition assessment, material composition, and applicable certifications.

clauses.title: Fire Safety Compliance
clauses.text: All upholstered furniture shall be certified to EN 1021-1 minimum, with EN 1021-2 certification required for items placed in public areas or escape routes. Certificates shall be provided prior to installation.

clauses.title: BVB Equivalency
clauses.text: For items without BVB rating, the Supplier shall provide BVB Equivalency Documentation demonstrating compliance with equivalent chemical content, fire safety, and structural safety standards.

clauses.title: Take-Back Commitment
clauses.text: The Supplier agrees to accept return of supplied items at end of use period for reuse, refurbishment, or responsible recycling, subject to condition assessment.

clauses.title: CO2 Reporting
clauses.text: The Supplier shall provide carbon footprint documentation for supplied items, including estimated CO2 savings compared to equivalent new products.

clauses.title: Warranty Terms
clauses.text: The Supplier warrants all refurbished items for a minimum period of [12/24] months against structural defects. Warranty covers frame, joints, and mechanical components.

usage: Incorporate relevant clauses into procurement contracts. Adjust percentages and timeframes based on project requirements and operator capabilities.
